name: RTCPeerConnection.ontrack
description: The RTCPeerConnection property ontrack is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the track event occurs, indicating that a track has been added to the RTCPeerConnection.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCPeerConnection.ontrack' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
